# Generated by binpac_quickstart
#
# File: CMakeLists.txt
# Date: 20161024
#
# Bro Internet Content Adaptation Protocol (ICAP) Analyzer
#

#
# Usage: Bro Core.
#
# Use this version of CMakeLists.txt when compiling
# the ICAP Analyzer directly into the Bro core.
#

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.8)

include(BroPlugin)
include_directories(BEFORE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})

bro_plugin_begin(MITRE ICAP)
	bro_plugin_cc(ICAP.cc Plugin.cc)
	bro_plugin_bif(events.bif)
	bro_plugin_pac(
		icap.pac
		icap-protocol.pac
		icap-analyzer.pac
		icap-analyzer-http.pac
		icap-analyzer-utils.pac
	)
	bro_plugin_dist_files(README CHANGES COPYING VERSION)
bro_plugin_end()
